wikipedia_page.main: Abdul Buhari (born 26 June 1982) is a British athlete who competes in the discus throw. He was born in Nigeria.

response: In July 2012 Morse was confirmed as part of the Great Britain team for the 2012 Summer Olympics in the men's discus alongside compatriots Lawrence Okoye and Abdul Buhari. The event was held at the Olympic Stadium on 6–7 August.
